name: Combat Positioning
description: Training to control combat space, angles, and movement for superior offensive and defensive positioning.

workout_groups.name: Fundamentals of Combat Positioning
workout_groups.description: Developing core movement patterns for maintaining advantageous positions in a fight.

workouts.name: Basic Combat Stance Control
workouts.description: Maintain and adjust foundational stances while ensuring balance and mobility.

workouts.name: Lateral Step & Strike Drill
workouts.description: Step sideways while striking, maintaining an optimal angle against the opponent.

workouts.name: Forward & Backward Engagement Drill
workouts.description: Advance and retreat while keeping a stable combat stance and ready positioning.

workouts.name: Angle Step & Redirection
workouts.description: Move at 45-degree angles to flank an opponent or escape an engagement.

workout_groups.name: Positioning for Defensive Control
workout_groups.description: Enhancing movement to gain a tactical advantage while minimizing exposure to attacks.

workouts.name: Cut-Step Evasion Drill
workouts.description: Use quick cut-steps to reposition and avoid direct attacks while staying in range.

workouts.name: Bait & Counter Positioning
workouts.description: Intentionally expose an opening to bait an attack, then reposition to counter.

workouts.name: Circling & Off-Line Maneuvering
workouts.description: Use circular movement to maintain control of the engagement, avoiding direct lines of attack.

workouts.name: Multiple Opponent Positioning Drill
workouts.description: Position yourself in a way that keeps multiple opponents lined up to reduce attack vectors.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Combat Positioning Tactics
workout_groups.description: Mastering superior spatial control and strategic movement in high-pressure combat scenarios.

workouts.name: Ambidextrous Position Switching
workouts.description: Switch dominant and non-dominant sides mid-combat while maintaining control of angles.

workouts.name: Unpredictable Footwork Drill
workouts.description: Vary movement patterns between fast and slow pacing to disrupt an opponent's rhythm.

workouts.name: Environmental Awareness Training
workouts.description: Use objects, obstacles, and surroundings to optimize positioning advantages.

workouts.name: Live Combat Positioning Sparring
workouts.description: Engage in sparring while focusing on controlling space and positioning over direct attacks.
